content: Which famous American author wrote the novel "The Great Gatsby" that was later adapted into several films?

F. Scott Fitzgerald is the famous American author who wrote the novel "The Great Gatsby." The novel has indeed been adapted into several films over the years, with different directors and actors bringing their own interpretations to the story. The most recent and well-known adaptation was released in 2013, directed by Baz Luhrmann and starring Leonardo DiCaprio as Jay Gatsby.
